en.title: FE Expands Fast in Vietnam! (1)
en.content:
FE recently held its 2nd Achievers Recognition Dinner at Dai Khanh Restaurant, Ho Chi Minh City on 07th March 2009. The event was attended by 500 enthusiastic Leaders, Members, Invited Guests and VIPs, including around 20 Leaders from Malaysia.

HIGHLIGHTS OF THE EVENT:

- Performances by Children Dance Troupe.

- Welcome Speech by Miss Vietnam Tourism International 2008,
  Phan Thi Ngoc Diem who was MC forthe night. Thank you, Diem, you did a great job!

- Opening Speech by Vietnam Country Licensee Ms Le Ngoc Hieu.

- Speech and sharing by Presidential Director KC Phoon.

- Quantum Pendant demos by KC Phoon who never fails to impress!

- Testimonial sharing by Quantum Pendant wearer, Huy.

- Speech by FE Founder CEO Paul Ting. Paul talks about the current global economic crisis and how
  the timing is perfect for FE to build a global network and establish itself as a leading global MLM
  company.

- Mockup Cheque RM 10,000 presentation to Vietnam Paralympics Team.
  This is FE's contribution andcommitment to support local sports and charities.

- Quantum Pendant presentation to members of the Vietnam Paralympics Team.

- Recognition of new Directors in Vietnam, one of whom, Dang Tran Thanh is deaf. Congratulations!

- Sharing by new Directors. It was amazing to hear how Dang Tran Thanh who is deaf succeeds in
  FE! You make us proud!

- Closing speech by PD KC Phoon. As usual, KC gave a great account on how to succeed in FE!

- Lucky Draw.
 
< Click Here For More Photos >

meta.description:
FE recently held it's 2nd Achievers Recognition Dinner at Dai Khanh Restaurant, Ho Chi Minh City on 7th March 2009. The event was attended by 500 enthusiastic Leaders, Members, invited guests and VIPs, including around 20 leaders from Malaysia.
Highlights of the Event :
- Performances by Children Dance Troupe.
- Welcome Speech by Miss Vietnam Tourism International 2008, Phan Thi Ngoc Diem who was MC for the night. Thank you, Diem, you did a great job!
- Opening Speech by Vietnam Country Licensee Ms Le Ngoc Hieu.
- Speech and sharing by Presidential Director KC Phoon.
- Quantum Pendant demos by KC Phoon who never fails to impress!
- Testimonial sharing by Quantum Pendant wearer, Huy.
- Speech by FE Founder CEO Paul Ting. Paul talks about the current global economic crisis and how the timing is perfect for FE to build a global network and establish itself as a leading global MLM company.
- Mockup Cheque RM 10,000 presentation to Vietnam Paralympics Team. This is FE's contribution and commitment to support local sports and charities.
- Quantum Pendant presentation to members of the Vietnam Paralympics Team.
- Recognition of new Directors in Vietnam, one of whom, Dang Tran Thanh is deaf. Congratulations!
- Sharing by new Directors. It was amazing to hear how Dang Tran Thanh who is deaf succeeds in FE! You make us proud!
- Closing speech by PD KC Phoon. As usual, KC gave a great account on how to succeed in FE!
- Lucky Draw.
